title: Clear day, slow city driving with 7 braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a quiet city street with multiple parked cars and a few pedestrians.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety and avoid collisions with parked cars or pedestrians.
